messages.message: When reviewing a deployment run in AIHub, can we put this module in somewhere more visible? Right now, it's hidden in this context menu and it took me some time / some clicking around to actually know the logs would be there. I think the larger piece of feedback is I'm not sure what the context menu signifies
Just to confirm: was the issue finding the dropdown menu in the navbar, or actually finding the logs in the Run info modal?

I think there's multiple considerations I had:
1. Finding the dropdown button
2. Understanding why I should click on the dropdown
The issue arose because I was looking for the run logs for a while and wasn't sure where to find them.

ty for the feedback on the navbar, keep them coming =)

cc @tj.serkes @hannah

imo this is high priority task since, for the customer, I was not able to find the actual run on the app runs page / deployment runs page which made me have to fall on the internal grafana tool to get the logs.
